title: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Makiyivka, Bilohorivka of Luhansk region and Terny¸ Serebryanka, Spirne of Donetsk re...
content: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Makiyivka, Bilohorivka of Luhansk region and Terny¸ Serebryanka, Spirne of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Serebryanske forestry of Luhansk region and Ozerne of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
